snippet: The University of Colorado Hospital said that no one at its switchboard talked to the suspect in the Aurora movie theater shooting before the attack, but that a caller did hang up without saying anything.
abstract: University of Colorado Hospital says that no one at its switchboard spoke to James E Holmes, the suspect in the Aurora movie theater shooting, in the minutes before the attack, but confirms that a caller did hang up without saying anything about eight minutes before 911 calls began coming in about the shooting.
lead_paragraph: The University of Colorado Hospital said that no one at its switchboard talked to the suspect in the Aurora movie theater shooting before the attack, but that a caller did hang up without saying anything.

headline.main: Colorado: Hospital Denies Talking To Shooting Suspect
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Hospital Denies Talking To Shooting Suspect
